content: hey let s knit a hypster beanie together for free this hat is round knitted bottom up and stands out with its integrated double seam giving it that distinctive hipster flair i ve adapted it for both child and adult sizes allowing you to make the most of even smaller yarn quantities for the pictured model i used two strands one of wool and one of mohair to add a cozy touch to knit it you ll only need a set of double-pointed needles 3 5mm/us4 and around 2 balls of each quality of yarn the instructions for this hat exists in french and english it s beginner friendly as an additional video tutorial is available on my youtube channel don t forget to tag us on instagram #terrifiknits and #hypsterhat or #bonnet hypster pattern available here link text 1 tutorial available here link text 2 1 https //www terrifiknits com/en/knitting/hypster-beanie-free-pattern 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=plruzagbpkw&ab_channel=terrifiknits
